posts.post_content:
Posted By: Craig D
Hi,
I am currently breaking up a group of about 70 different T206 American Beauties.  All of the cards are ungraded.  All three back types are represented.  The cards grade from F to EX, most in the VG range.  Instead of posting a very long list here.  Please email me at mackeyd@mailcity.com and I will send you the card list on an Excel spreadsheet.  Front and back scans available upon request.

Thanks,
Craig

Posted By: Craig D
Bump for the New Year.  Thanks!

Posted By: Mike
Craig,

   I sent email Sunday to you at mackeyd@mailcity.com - did you receive?  Am interested in the list + scans of any Pirates you may have.  Thanks.

--
Mike

Posted By: robert a
Hey Craig,

I also emailed you back about a couple.

Thanks.

Rob

Posted By: Craig D
Mike & Rob,

Sorry my emails didn't get through to you, maybe they landed in your junk mail folders.  I just re-sent the list to you both.  Thanks for your patience.   Craig

Posted By: Scott
Hi Craig,
If you have a Luther Taylor card, I'll buy it.  Please send a scan and your price to scottg@accessmfgsys.com.
Thanks,
Scott.

Posted By: Mike
Thanks for the resend, Craig

It was in junk mail - I've responded on Miller.  Appreciate it.

--
Mike

Posted By: Dave Hornish
E-mail sent on Oakes, Sheckard (Glove) and Stahl (Glove)

Posted By: bigfish
Criag,
could you please e-mail me a list?

tp7161@yahoo.com

Posted By: Chuck P
Craig:  Are you getting emails?

I sent a check Wed. and inquired about what you have left later that day.

Chuck

Posted By: Craig D
Chuck,

Must have missed your email somehow.  Sorry.  Check received - thanks!  Updated list sent via email a few minutes ago.

Only about 25 left - whatever doesn't sell goes back into the vault!

Thanks to everyone.  - Craig

Posted By: Doug Moore
Craig, please send me the list of what you have left, I would appreciate it.


Doug Moore

Posted By: Danny Smith
Hello,

Could you please email me the list of remaining available cards? Thanks.

Danny 
smithdfs@hotmail.com
